resources.string:
This app Includes Sensitivity Settings, Control Layouts, and Character ID Of Popular Streamers. This App is Just to Provide a Little Help on your way to being a Good Player. The Data in this App was taken at the time of Development. In Case If any Streamer Will change his/her Settings I will reupdate the Data ASAP If You Guys will Keep Supporting us Then we will Provide Latest Updates and Tricks regularly.
 If any player changes his sensitivity, we will try to upadate quickly.
 Sensitivity Credit goes to -;
 All popular Streamers
